description: SANTOSH SHARMA is the recipient of Star Citizen Honour 2013. He is the father of “Dissolve the Box” and “Intent leadership”. Earlier in his career, he contributed to the automobile, consulting, banking, equity and aviation industries, but life had more to offer. He is now the pioneer behind Freedom Foundation and also a visiting faculty at the IIMs. He is a CMA and holds a Professional Diploma in Management from the American Management Association.
name: Santosh Sharma
